title: Disjoint Set
snippet: Disjoint Set, also know as Union Find is a data stucture that tracks a Set of elements partitioned into number of disjoint subsets.It offers near constant time operations to add new sets, merge existing sets and to find whether items are in the same set or not, disjoint sets can be used to detect...

title: Can you randomly reorder an array in `O(n)`? - Fisher-Yates Modern Shuffle algorithm
snippet: This question is similar to “shuffle a deck of cards” or “randomize a given array”, here shuffle means that every permutation of array element should be equally likely.We can solve this problem in various ways.Solution 1 Generate a random value for each item in array. title: Hidden facts about forEach in JavaScript
snippet: We have been using forEach in JavaScript for a while now, it improves the readability of our code, but what really forEach is? Is forEach a loop in JavaScript?1: It is not a loopYes you heard it, forEach is not a loop, it is a higher order function avilable on Array class which takes a callback a...

title: Is forEach a loop in JavaScript?
snippet: This question has confused many of us for a long time, is it a loop? or is it a function?In JavaScript a for loop repeats until a specified condition evaluates to false, it is similar to the Java and C for loop, let’s assume there’s an array of students and I want to print information of each stu...
